homePage.introText: Track your runs, rides, and workouts. Log where you train, earn achievements, and join a community of active people!
homePage.feature1: Register your running, cycling, or other activities with location tracking.
homePage.feature2: Earn badges and achievements as you reach new milestones.
homePage.feature3: Review your stats and progress over time.
